comment: CR-017: Initial migration to QMS control

Template correctly implements CR-044 specifications. Recommend proceeding to approval.

REVIEW COMPLETE - RECOMMEND FOR APPROVAL

**Frontmatter Verification:**
- title: 'Change Record Template' - VERIFIED
- revision_summary: 'CR-051: Add explicit RTM approval verification in Phases 9.5 and 9.6 per SOP-006 Section 7.4' - VERIFIED (references authorizing CR)

**CR-051 Section 5.3 Implementation Verification:**

**Change 1: Phase 9.5 Header and Step 4**

Header changed from 'RTM Update' to 'RTM Update and Approval' - VERIFIED

Step 4 added: 'Verify RTM reaches EFFECTIVE status before proceeding to Phase 6' - VERIFIED

**Change 2: Phase 9.6 Prerequisite and Verification Steps**

Prerequisite note added: 'RS and RTM must both be EFFECTIVE before proceeding (per SOP-006 Section 7.4)' - VERIFIED

New verification steps added before merge:
- Step 1: Verify RS is EFFECTIVE (document status check) - VERIFIED
- Step 2: Verify RTM is EFFECTIVE (document status check) - VERIFIED
- Steps 3-6: Original steps renumbered - VERIFIED

**Cross-Reference Verification:**
- References SOP-006 Section 7.4 - VERIFIED

**Content Match:** All changes match CR-051 Section 5.3 exactly.

**Placeholder Check:** Template placeholders (curly braces, square brackets) appropriate for template document. No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX in non-placeholder content.
**Typos/Errors:** None found.
**Formatting:** Consistent throughout.

RECOMMENDATION: Approve. TEMPLATE-CR correctly implements INV-010 CAPA-002.

REVIEW: RECOMMEND

Frontmatter verified:
- title: "Change Record Template" (unchanged)
- revision_summary: "CR-083: Codify merge type and qualified commit convention in CODE CR PATTERNS and Phase 6" (references CR ID, descriptive)

Structure: Template structure unchanged. All sections present.

Placeholder check: Template placeholders ({{...}} and [...]) present as expected. No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX found.

Scope compliance: Changes confined to CODE CR PATTERNS comment block and Phase 6 (Section 9.6) as authorized by CR-083 EI-3. All other sections unchanged from effective. No scope creep.

CODE CR PATTERNS changes verified:
- Added SOP cross-references: "(SOP-006 Section 7.4)" for merge gate, "(SOP-005 Section 7.1.2)" for qualified commit, "(SOP-005 Section 7.1.3)" for merge type. All references valid.
- Qualified commit definition updated: "The qualified commit is the execution branch commit verified by CI" -- consistent with SOP-005 7.1.2.
- New merge type bullet: "regular merge commit (--no-ff). Squash merges are prohibited" -- consistent with SOP-005 7.1.3.
- Added fourth "ensures" bullet: "The qualified commit hash in the RTM is reachable on main via merge commit" -- consistent with SOP-005 7.1.4 rationale.
- Terminology updated from "dev branch" to "execution branch" in qualification bullet -- consistent with SOP-005.

Phase 6 changes verified:
- Step 4 updated from "Merge PR" to "Merge PR using merge commit -- not squash (per SOP-005 Section 7.1.3)" -- adds merge type with SOP reference.
- New step 5 added: "Verify qualified commit hash from execution branch is reachable on main" -- adds verification step.
- Steps 6-7 correctly renumbered from previous 5-6.

Formatting: Consistent with effective version. Comment blocks use ASCII-only style throughout; no em-dash inconsistency.

Cross-consistency: All SOP cross-references point to valid subsections in SOP-005 and SOP-006 drafts. Merge type, qualified commit, and merge gate definitions are consistent across all three documents.

REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All criteria verified with evidence against CR-084 pre-approved scope.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Change Record Template" -- present, non-empty, unchanged.
- revision_summary: "CR-084: Add integration verification to CODE CR PATTERNS, Section 8, and new Phase 5" -- references CR-084 per SOP-002 Section 8.

CHANGES VERIFIED (per CR-084 Section 5.3):

A. CODE CR PATTERNS: New bullet added ("Integration verification is required before merge (SOP-002 Section 6.8)"). New "ensures" bullet added ("Changed functionality is verified in a running system"). Cross-reference to SOP-002 Section 6.8 valid. Confirmed.

B. Section 8 (Testing Summary): Restructured with comment block, two subsections (Automated Verification, Integration Verification). Comment references SOP-002 Section 6.8 and notes document-only CR simplification. Confirmed.

C. Section 9 (Implementation Plan): New Phase 5 (Integration Verification) inserted at 9.5. Four steps: launch, exercise, confirm, document. Comment block explains three-layer distinction (Phase 4 CI, Phase 5 integration, Phase 7 step 7 smoke test). Downstream phases renumbered correctly: 9.6 (RTM, was 9.5), 9.7 (Merge, was 9.6), 9.8 (Documentation, was 9.7). Phase 6 step 4 correctly references "Phase 7". Total: 8 phases, sections 9.1-9.8. Confirmed.

SCOPE BOUNDARY: Only CODE CR PATTERNS comment, Section 8, and Section 9 were modified. All other sections unchanged from effective v4.0.

No unintended placeholder content, typos, or formatting issues found.

Review complete. COMPLIANT.

FRONTMATTER: title="Change Record Template" (unchanged), revision_summary="CR-085: Add pre-execution commit reminder to execution instructions" (correctly references CR-085 per SOP-002 Section 8).

CHANGE VERIFIED: Two new lines added to the EXECUTION PHASE INSTRUCTIONS comment block in Section 10, between the "NOTE" line and the existing bullet points: "PRE-EXECUTION: Before releasing for execution, commit and push the QMS repository to preserve the pre-execution baseline (per SOP-004 Section 5)." References SOP-004 Section 5 as required. Matches CR-085 Section 5.3 specification.

NO UNINTENDED CHANGES: All content outside the execution instructions comment block is identical to the effective version (v5.0).

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: Template placeholders ({{...}} and [...]) are intentional template content. No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX found.
FORMATTING: Consistent throughout.
TYPOS/ERRORS: None found.

Recommend for approval.
